name: Sundered Sky
passive: Lightshield Strike: After using an ability, your next attack deals bonus physical damage based on target's missing Health and heals you (1.5 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Health, Ability Haste. Passive effect: After using an ability, your next attack deals bonus physical damage based on target's missing Health and heals you (1.5 second cooldown).. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Perfect for enhancing your team's capabilities
Helps protect and empower your carries
The active/passive effect can turn the tide of team fights
Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
